clubs.name: Agro-Industrialization Club
clubs.description: Established on April 1, 2011, it is the first initiative among private universities in Bangladesh to represent the industrialization of agro products and uphold the agricultural economy globally.
clubs.mission: To contribute to society, understand agriculture and its supply chain, develop entrepreneurial and leadership skills, and promote sustainable development.

clubs.name: Business Club
clubs.description: The first club of the university, established to promote leadership and entrepreneurship among students.

clubs.name: Creative Marketing Club
clubs.description: The nation's first-ever marketing club with the motto 'Communicate to Learn'.

clubs.name: Computer Programming Club
clubs.description: Aims to improve computer programming skills and is open to all EWU students regardless of department.

clubs.name: Club for Performing Arts
clubs.description: Established on November 14, 2009, it brings together musicians, actors, dancers, and designers to celebrate performing arts.
clubs.mission: Promoting Bangladeshi Culture and Recognizing Meaningful International Cultures

clubs.name: Debating Club
clubs.description: Promotes oratory skills, inspires discipline, and builds fraternity among debaters.

clubs.name: Economics Club
clubs.description: Established in 2015 to provide a platform for students to gain real-life experience and develop academic and professional skills beyond textbooks.
clubs.focus: Soft skills, leadership, communication through seminars, competitions, and workshops.

clubs.name: Electronics Club
clubs.description: One of the oldest and most prestigious clubs, established in 2004.

clubs.name: English Conversation Club
clubs.description: One of the oldest and most dynamic clubs, focused on skill development through literary and communication events.

clubs.name: Environmental & Social Club
clubs.description: Established on October 14, 1999, with the motto 'SAVE LIFE, SAVE EARTH'.

clubs.name: Investment and Finance Club
clubs.description: Grooms students through corporate visits, workshops, and seminars in investment and finance.

clubs.name: IEEE Student Branch
clubs.description: Provides networking, scholarships, and tech learning opportunities through IEEE affiliation.

clubs.name: Model United Nation Club
clubs.description: Produces diplomatic leaders by simulating UN conferences and fostering negotiation skills.
clubs.mission: To harness diplomatic and leadership skills through simulation and discourse.

clubs.name: Photography Club
clubs.description: Established in September 2000 to raise awareness about visual storytelling and photography.

clubs.name: Robotics Club
clubs.description: Introduces students to robotics, IoT, and AI through hands-on learning.

clubs.name: Rotaract Club
clubs.description: A Rotary-sponsored service club for youth (18â€“30) focused on community service and leadership.

clubs.name: Science Club
clubs.description: Organizes science and math-related events to promote STEM awareness.

clubs.name: Sociology Club
clubs.description: Promotes culture, patriotism, and social awareness through academic and community events.

clubs.name: Sports Club
clubs.description: One of the largest and most active clubs, promoting physical fitness and team spirit.

clubs.name: Telecommunication Club
clubs.description: Enhances knowledge in telecom, IoT, data science, and IT career readiness.

clubs.name: Cyber Security Club
clubs.description: Dedicated to fostering cybersecurity awareness and technical proficiency.

clubs.name: EWU Health and Well-Being Club
clubs.description: Promotes physical and mental well-being among students through health awareness initiatives.
